Step8.Description: The attacker switches to the 'ctf' user and attempts to read the 'flag.txt' file again.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker aims to use the cracked password to escalate privileges and read the flag.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker switches to the 'ctf' user using the cracked password and attempts to 'cat' the 'flag.txt' file again.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully switches to the 'ctf' user and reads the 'flag.txt' file, obtaining the flag.
